bibl.title: Esclavage antique et discriminations socio-culturelles. Actes du XXVIIIe Colloque international du Groupement international de recherche sur l'esclavage antique (Mytilène, 5-7 décembre 2003)
bibl.note: From Plato to Athenaeus and Varro, the view is widespread that slaves should be discouraged from forming groups (speakers of the same language, members of the same nationality). Examines the inscriptional and papyrological evidence to see how far this tendency was actually carried out in practice.
